narrative.narrative: Chicago Express Airlines was around from 1993 to 2005 and in its last 5 years starting June 1st,1999 were part of ATA Airlines and operated as ATA Connection for a time. It was based at Midway Airport and attempted a hub at Indianapolis later in its life. It operated at 2 other Illinois airports, 4 in Indiana,2 in Iowa,1 in Kentucky,3 in Michigan,2 in Ohio and 2 in Wisconsin. ATA terminated Chicago Express March 28,2005. Its fleet at the end were 16 Saab 340B's, all ex American Eagle planes. Prior to 1999-2000 it used Jetstream 31's.
